description.value:
A Ninja must be ready to move through any terrain and cross any obstacle to accomplish their goals.  With this ability you can walk across water as if it were solid ground, as long as you do not start or end your turn on or in the water.  Should you end your turn over water, you may spend 1 Spirit to stay standing on its surface and continue walking across the water next turn.  If you started in water, you may spend 1 Spirit to rise to its surface and walk across it.
    Additionally, you may spend 1 Spirit on your turn to gain one of the following abilities until the start of your next turn.  You may have more than one of these active at a time, but each one still costs 1 Spirit: 

  • Walk across other liquids as if they were water, using the same rules stated above.
  • Walk along walls as though they were flat terrain.
  • Ignore rough terrain.
  • Run across a gap, chasm, etc.  as long as you start and end your movement on solid ground.  This kind of movement can only be made horizontally.

system.requirements: Must have the Rogue Starter Abilities
